data.title: Joanna of Aragon, Countess of Ampurias
data.meta_description: Joanna of Aragon was the second child of Peter IV of Aragon and his first wife Maria of Navarre. She was an Infanta of Aragon by birth and Countess of Ampurias by her marriage. She was a member of the House of Barcelona.
data.text:
For other people named Joanna of Aragon, see Joanna of Aragon (disambiguation).

Joanna of Aragon (7 November 1344, Barcelona - 1385, Castell√≥n, Ampurias) was the second child of Peter IV of Aragon and his first wife Maria of Navarre. She was an Infanta of Aragon by birth and Countess of Ampurias by her marriage. She was a member of the House of Barcelona.
